name: stick
effect: Held by Farfetch'd: Raises the holder's critical hit counter by 2.
short_effect: Raises Farfetch'd's critical hit ratio by two stages.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
A stick of leek.
It can be sold
cheaply.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A hold item that
raises FARFETCH’D’s
critical-hit ratio.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A stick of leek to be held by a
FARFETCH’D. It raises FARFETCH’D’s
critical-hit ratio.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
An item to be held by FARFETCH’D. It is
a very long and stiff stalk of leek
that boosts the critical-hit ratio.
